title: Update HF_TOKEN detection and model download
body:
# What does this PR do?

1. For best security practices HF_TOKEN should be first pulled out from the environment and maybe then from configuration file, this PR ensures it.
2. Model download is handled manually. This PR relies on `huggingface_hub` lib to download the model using `hf_transfer` simplifying the current process.
author: Hugoch

comments.body: hi @Hugoch, thanks for your PR, I am going to review it

title: Test convergence
body: Fix the error, make 4D compatible, gradient accumulation, process group order, add logs
author: zzhhjjj

comments.body: before merging, maybe test Context parallel as well ?
